titleStmt.title: A true copy of the Welch sermon preached before the two princes, Prince Rupert and Prince Maurice, at Dover, a little before they imbarked themselves, with what they had plundered out of England and Wales, to passe beyond the seas preached by Shon up Owen, priest, his text being 2. Esdras Chap. 7, verse 15.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
